welcome.title: Welcome to Cima Sync!

step1.title: üåê Select Your Language
step1.description: Hey Cimarr√≥n! This app automatically connects you to the campus WiFi network. Choose your preferred language to continue.

step2.title: üîê Automatic Session
step2.description: Enable 'Remember session' and forget about typing your password. The app will log you in every time it detects the Cimarr√≥n network.

step3.title: üõ°Ô∏è Your Privacy Matters
step3.description: Your credentials are securely stored on your device. They are never sent to external servers. You can delete them anytime from Settings.

step4.title: ‚ö° Auto Start
step4.description: Want Cima Sync to open automatically when you turn on your computer? You'll always be ready to connect.
